buffs.description: Even if the Priest is in the Time Shop, there is a chance for the 5 times speed buff starts every 10th floor (5-star 1%, 6-star 2.5%, Max 30%). Even when passing 10 floors with elves' Secret Skill (from 9th to 11th), there is a chance for the 5 times speed buff to start.
buffs.name: God's Blessing

hidden_abilites: Even if the Priest is at the Time Shop, 5 times speed buff starts every 10th floor. ( 5-star 1%, 6-star 2.5% )
The chance for 5 times speed buff by Priests in the Time Shop cannot exceed 30%.
Even when passing 10 floors with elves' Secret Skill (from 9th to 11th), the 5 times speed buff can start.
description.skill2: Increase range dodge rate of range unit in PvP (0.6%, 1.2%, 1.8%, 2.4%, 3%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Preist ]
